title: Rubella
creator_credit: Rubella Committee Deafness Foundation of Victoria
brief_description: Designed to inform pubescent and teenaged girls of the need to vaccinate against German measles to prevent rubella in the unborn child. Outlines the congenital defects caused by rubella in the first six weeks of pregnancy. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
